description.description: The main description for the abstract.

aside.description: The optional aside element. Only shown if the 'menu' property is empty.

image.description: The image to use in the aside.

alt.description: The alt text for the image, required for accessibility.

height.description: The height of the image in pixels.

src.description: The relative or absolute path to the image file.

width.description: The width of the image in pixels.

href.description: The link target for the aside title.

width.description: The maximum width of the aside.

menu.description: The menu in the abstract section.

items.description: The collection of menu items, in display order.

href.description: The link target for the menu item.

text.description: The display text for the menu item.

sections.description: A collection of page sections to display.

items.description: The items to display within the section, along with their display type.

type.description: The content type of the section item.

style.description: The list display type to use. Only used when 'type' parameter is 'list' or 'table'.

className.description: A CSS classname to apply to list content. Only used when 'type' parameter is 'list'.

columns.description: The number of columns to use for list content. Only used if 'type' parameter is 'list', 'style' parameter is 'cards', and 'className' parameter is 'cardsM'.

tableColumns.description: A collection of items to use as the heading row for the table. Only used when 'type' parameter is 'table'.

image.description: The image to use in the table header cell.

alt.description: The alt text for the image. Will display as header text if used. If unused, alt text will be the column index.

src.description: The relative or absolute path to the image file.

width.description: The width of the image in pixels.

tableRows.description: The rows for the table. Only used when 'type' parameter is 'table'.

title.description: The display title that identifies the table row.

values.description: A collection of values to display in the table row, in display order.

href.description: The link target for the table cell.

content.description: The raw content of the section item. Only used if 'type' parameter is 'markdown'.

items.description: A collection of list items, in display order.

title.description: The list item Level 3 Heading title. Not used when 'style' parameter is 'ordered' or 'unordered'.

content.description: The list item content. Not used when 'style' parameter is 'icon48' or 'icon64'.

href.description: The list item text. Only used if list item 'content' is empty.

image.description: The image to use in the list item. Only used when 'style' parameter is 'card', 'icon48', or 'icon64'.

src.description: The relative or absolute path to the image file.

href.description: The link target for the list item.
